name: What Makes You Tick: A Stitch in Time
name_original: What Makes You Tick: A Stitch in Time
description:
What Makes You Tick: A Stitch in Time is an adventure game developed by Lassie Games. It came out on 10-09-2010. Lassie Games published the game.
What Makes You Tick: A Stitch in Time is available on PC.
